alert.note: Alert for Logan County; Morgan County; Washington County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 15 at 7:35PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Morgan, northwestern Washington and south central Logan Counties through 830 PM MDT... At 734 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Hillrose, or 14 miles east of Fort Morgan, moving south at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Fort Morgan, Brush, Log Lane Village, Merino, Hillrose, Gary, Prewitt Reservoir, Antelope Springs, Twelve-Mile Corner, Adena School, Snyder, Midway and Woodrow. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Logan County; Morgan County; Washington County
